offer-bank-consent-copy.free-subscriptio: Al marcar esta casilla, acepta los Términos y condiciones de nuestro servicio. Se le cargarán 0,10 € en su cuenta con fines de autenticación. Este importe se le reembolsará una vez completada la transacción. En su cuenta se cobrará de forma recurrente el importe total de la suscripción. La suscripción seguirá activa hasta que la cancele.
offer-bank-consent-copy.paid-not-subscri: Al marcar esta casilla, aceptas los Términos y condiciones de nuestro servicio.
offer-bank-consent-copy.paid-subscriptio: Al marcar esta casilla, acepta los Términos y condiciones de nuestro servicio. En su cuenta se cobrará de forma recurrente el importe total de la suscripción. La suscripción seguirá activa hasta que la cancele.

offer-card.switch-details-downgrade.defe: El cambio a un plan inferior está pendiente. Tendrá acceso a {{translatedTitle}} hasta el {{subscriptionExpirationDate}}. A partir de ese momento, se le cobrará el nuevo precio, y tendrá acceso a {{translatedSwitchTitle}}. Puede cancelarlo en cualquier momento.
offer-card.switch-details-downgrade.imme: El cambio a un plan inferior está pendiente y debería completarse en unos minutos. Se le cobrará el nuevo precio inmediatamente, y tendrá acceso a {{translatedSwitchTitle}}. Puede cancelarlo en cualquier momento.

El cambio a un plan inferior está pendiente y debería completarse en unos minutos. Se le cobrará el nuevo precio a partir del {{subscriptionExpirationDate}}. {{translatedSwitchTitle}} se renueva automáticamente. Puede cancelarlo en cualquier momento.
offer-card.switch-details-upgrade.deferr: El cambio a un plan superior está pendiente. Tendrá acceso a {{translatedTitle}} hasta el {{subscriptionExpirationDate}}. A partir de ese momento, se le cobrará el nuevo precio, y tendrá acceso a {{translatedSwitchTitle}}. Puede cancelarlo en cualquier momento.
offer-card.switch-details-upgrade.immedi: El cambio a un plan superior está pendiente y debería completarse en unos minutos. Se le cobrará el nuevo precio inmediatamente, y tendrá acceso a {{translatedSwitchTitle}}. Puede cancelarlo en cualquier momento.

El cambio a un plan superior está pendiente y debería completarse en unos minutos. Se le cobrará el nuevo precio a partir del {{subscriptionExpirationDate}}. {{translatedSwitchTitle}} se renueva automáticamente. Puede cancelarlo en cualquier momento.
offer-card.switch-details.upgrade-pendin: El cambio a un plan superior está pendiente.

offer-standard-consent-copy.checkout-not: Al marcar esta casilla, acepta los Términos y condiciones de nuestro servicio.
offer-standard-consent-copy.checkout-sub: Se le cobrarán {{readablePrice}}/3 meses o el precio vigente en ese momento, más impuestos aplicables, de forma recurrente. La suscripción se renovará automáticamente hasta que la cancele. Para cancelarla, inicie sesión en su cuenta, haga clic en «Gestionar» junto a su suscripción y luego haga clic en «Darse de baja». Al marcar esta casilla, reconoce y acepta expresamente estos términos, así como los Términos de servicio completos.

redeem-gift.description.existing-subscri: Your existing subscription will be extended for 3 additional months for free.
Your existing subscription will be extended for 6 additional months for free.
Your existing subscription will be extended for one additional month for free.
Your existing subscription will be extended for one additional season for free.
Your existing subscription will be extended for one additional week for free.
Your existing subscription will be extended for one additional year for free.
redeem-gift.description.refusal.external: You already have an active subscription in a different store, perhaps through a mobile app. Once that subscription expires, you can come back and redeem your gift code here.
redeem-gift.description.refusal.more-tha: You currently have multiple subscriptions granting you access to the content this gift provides. When one of those subscriptions expires, you can come back and redeem your gift code here.
redeem-gift.description.refusal.offer-ge: Sorry, this gift code can't be used in your current location due to geographic restrictions.
redeem-gift.description.refusal.offer-in: Sorry, but the offer linked to your gift code is no longer available.
redeem-gift.description.refusal.publishe: Sorry, this gift code can't be used in your current location due to geographic restrictions.
redeem-gift.description.refusal.recurrin: You’ll be able to redeem your gift code once we've finished processing a payment on your existing subscription
redeem-gift.description.refusal.redeemed: This gift code has already been used
redeem-gift.thank-you-page.manage-text1: Your gift have been successfully redeemed.
redeem-gift.thank-you-page.manage-text2: If you need help from us with your account, you can always find it<1>here</1>.
redeem-gift.thank-you-page.payment-metho: We hope you love it. Remember that in order to keep your access after your gift expires, you will need to add a payment method to your account.
register-form.error.account: You would need our product <1>Core</1> to call this API
register-form.error.captcha-verification: An error occurred during registration. Please try again later. If the issue persists, please reach out to our support team for assistance.
register-form.error.email-verification-f: We couldn't verify the email address you entered. Please check it for accuracy and try again. If you're sure the address is correct and still see this message, you may need to use a different email or contact support for help.
register-form.error.server-overloaded: Server overloaded. Please try again later.

switchplan-popup-info: You are about to change your plan from {{ fromOfferTitle }} to {{ toOfferTitle }}.
switchplan-popup-info-deferred: You will continue to have access to {{ currentPlan }} until {{ expiresAt }}. From that time you will be charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ nextPaymentPrice }} on a recurring basis for your new subscription.
switchplan-popup-info-immediateandcharge: You will be charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ currentPrice }} and immediately granted access to the selected plan. You will continue to be charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ nextPaymentPrice }} a recurring basis until you cancel.

You will be charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ currentPrice }}. You will also be fully refunded for your previous subscription. You will continue to be charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ nextPaymentPrice }} on a recurring basis until you cancel.
You will be charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ currentPrice }} and immediately granted access to the selected plan.

You will be charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ currentPrice }} and immediately granted access to your selected plan. The remaining value from the previous subscription will be refunded. You will continue to be charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ nextPaymentPrice }} on a recurring basis until you cancel.

You will be immediately charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ currentPrice }} and granted access to the selected plan. Your next billing date will be changed and pushed towards, based on the time left on your previous subscription.
switchplan-popup-info-immediatewithoutpr: You will be immediately granted access to your selected plan and charged a new price {{ currencySymbol }}{{ currentPrice }} on your next billing date {{ expiresAt }}
switchplan-popup-info-immediatewithtimep: You will be immediately granted access to your selected plan. Your next billing date will be changed and pushed towards, based on the time left on your previous subscription. From that time, you will be charged {{ currencySymbol }}{{ nextPaymentPrice }} on a recurring basis.
